description:
The aim of this elective course of the Master of Technology (MTech) in Knowledge Engineering (KE) is to introduce Neural Networks and Support Vector Machines 
and their role in the development of intelligent systems for Business Analytics The objectives of the course are to: 
(1) Introduce computational intelligence techniques with a focus on Neural Networks and Support Vector Machine. 
(2) Explore how these techniques can be used to construct intelligent systems to solve real-world problems such as classification, clustering and prediction.
title: Computational Intelligence I
